title: Removal mechanisms of illicit and psychoactive drugs in different wastewater treatment processes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,847-859
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00673E, Paper
Luis Restrepo-Vieira, Kathryn L. Linge, Francesco Busetti, Cynthia A. Joll
For illicit and psychoactive drugs which remain in the water phase, better removal was linked to improved biodegradation conditions.
